summary: Custom Redguard follower with Two-handed, Archery, and Sneak perks.  Available in custom CBBE & UUNP; Base CBBE & UNP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6][b]Zoputa[/b][/size][/color]

[i][color=#f4cccc]~Nigerian for Protector~[/color][/i]

[color=#ea9999][size=2]She's skillful, petulant and sincere. Which isn't out of the ordinary for someone with her gruesome past.

She was born and grew up in a broken family in a large village, she lived free of worries until she was about 15 years old, but at that point things changed.

She killed somebody during a long lasting heatwave and was rejected by all. With a new found friend she had to survive in a brutal world. But with her powers and diligence, she managed to start a new life and go beyond expectations. This has turned her into the woman she is today.

While constantly travelling the world, she now works as a travelling help for hire. By doing so, she hopes to find vengeance for the actions in the past and finally find friends she has never had.

[/size][/color][i][color=#f4cccc]Character Created by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url][/color][/i]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/o1ryu94av/20161102001645_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Zoputa
Race:  Custom Redguard Race
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1
Weight:  100
Body:  Custom CBBE
Skin:  Demoniac 4K
Armor:  Falmer Bikini Armor
Weapon:  Falmer Sword Staff, Real Bows Orcish Replacer w/ Daedric Arrows
Location:  Riverwood - Riverwood Trader

Class:  Combat Warrior Two Handed
Style:  Boss Two Handed

Levels with player.  Redguard Traits/bonuses.
Skill bonuses:  Two Handed, Archery, Sneak
Complete Perk Trees:  Two Handed, Archery, Sneak

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fksgjbzlz/enb_2016_10_24_03_13_56_82.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[b][u]No Armor Custom Version:[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url] for the custom body
HDT Compatible Skeleton ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url])

[b][u]Armor Version:[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
HDT Compatible Skeleton ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url])
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels[/url]
Dawnguard

[b][u]Base Body Types - No Armor: 
[/u][/b][i]Untested as it was quick addition due to request.[/i]

No Requirements At This Time
[/font][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cuuirf5dz/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Why don't you include the necessary skeleton?
A:  Too many horror stories of having my own game messed up by having multiple skeletons installed.

Q:  Will you release other body options?
A: If time and my health allows, yes.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*
A:  Zoputa is not my character therefore there are no changes planned to her appearance.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vupfdrnd3/CreditsResources.png[/img]
